name: A Night At Shady's (Official-Fangame)
description:
Can you survive the night in this cringe game?
Play it and find out!

How To Play :

If Meltdown Shady appears at the door,keep it closed until you hear another sound

If you hear a echoing sound,open the cameras until you hear it again

If a Ad plays,close it

If you hear a item dropping sound and click the Pick Up Item button to pick it up

Can you make it to 8 Am?

Square Button -> Camera
Circle Button -> Back
